title.rendered: Anker iPhone 12 Charger Cable, USB C to Lightning Cable [3Ft Apple MFi Certified] Powerline II for iPhone 12/11/ Pro/Max…

content.rendered:

(*12*)

PowerLine II

PowerLine II represents the evolution of the charging cable. Built for unprecedented sturdiness and efficiency, and suitable with the most recent high-speed charging expertise.

PowerLine II USB-C to Lightning Cable (3ft)

The cable that your iPhone deserves.

Superior sturdiness. Support for high-speed charging through Power Delivery. This is the world-famous PowerLine II, now with a brand new set of connectors for the present cell technology. MFi licensed for flawless compatibility with all Lightning gadgets, and able to charging speeds which can be 2.5× quicker than inventory Lightning expertise.

  • – Universal Compatibility

Power Delivery Support

Premium Components

High-Speed Data

Transfer music, films, and extra between iPhone and MacEbook in seconds.

Universal Compatibility

The Anker Advantage

High-speed charging. Leading expertise. Join our household of over 30 million joyful customers, and alter the best way you cost.

Read more

PowerLine II USB-C to Lightning Cable

The Cable That’s Yours For Life

From Strength to Strength

PowerLine II tolerates being bent over 12,000 occasions, lasting an unlimited 12x longer than different cables.

Certified Compatibility

MFi certification means whole peace of thoughts as a result of PowerLine II is totally Apple licensed. Designed to work flawlessly with iPhone, iPad, iPod or any gadget with a Lightning port.

Make certain this suits by getting into your mannequin quantity.
Power supply: use this cable together with your USB-C energy supply charger (together with Apple 18W 29W, 30W, 61W, or 87W USB-C energy adapter) to cost your iOS gadget, and entry fast-charging for iPhone 8, 8 Plus, x, XS, XR, XS Max, and later fashions.
Charge and sync: join your iPhone, iPad, or iPod with Lightning connector to your USB-C or Thunderbolt 3 (USB-C) enabled Mac and iPad Pro to seamlessly sync and cost.
Ultimate Durability: lasts 12× longer than different cables and confirmed to stand up to over 12000 bends in strict laboratory exams.
Mfi: mfi certification and strict high quality testing guarantee your Apple gadgets are charged safely, at their quickest doable pace..
A cable for life: we’re so assured about energy line II’s long-lasting efficiency that we gave it a hassle-free, lifetime.
